Blacknightmare:

The feme didn't say anything and she remain togehter Malice

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "We'll there in a half hour, cause Splattercannon will have to 
take it easy with all the energon he's carrying.  Let me know if 
something happens to Malice.  We drop everything and get to you, 
just in case." the Sweep commander said as she and Splattercannon 
wound their way to the room.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Sleeping"said the femme"But I guess that he would like to take 
his 
> dinner soon"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Hellplague:
> >  
> > Malice nodded, and soon fell asleep again.  But this time his 
> power system would continue to power up, and his systems continue 
to 
> recover.
> >  
> > Hellplague finished loading Splattercannon with energon cubes.  
> The gunship lifted from the floor, and leaned from side to side, 
> trying to adjust the added weight.  He went ahead of her and the 
> Sweep commander grabbed a few cubes before leaving herself.
> > "Alright Blacknightmare, we're on our way.  How's Malice?"
> 
>
